THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE NATURALIZATION STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT OTHER (SPECIFY): 9/14/89 IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS. WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT. APPLICANT: BE SURE TO PUT YOUR NAME AND ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN THE BOX OUTLINED BY HEAVY BORDER BELOW.
